Package dist

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConditionalDistribution
    A conditional probability distribution
    Distribution
    A interface for distributions
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractConditionalDistribution
    An abstract condtional distribution
    AbstractDistribution
    An abstract distribution
    DiscreteDependencyTree
    A discrete dependency distribution
    DiscreteDependencyTreeNode
    A node in a discrete dependency tree
    DiscreteDependencyTreeRootNode
    A root node in a discrete dependency tree
    DiscreteDistribution
    A probabilitiy function for representing single discrete output values
    DiscreteDistributionTable
    A class implementing a look up table for conditional probability, that is representing P(O = o | I = i) for some single discrete random variables O the output and I the input
    DiscretePermutationDistribution
    A distribution of all of the permutations of a set size.
    DiscreteUniformDistribution
    A distribution of all of the permutations of a set size.
    FixedComponentMixtureDistribution
    A output distribution that restricts itself to being a mixture of fixed distributions
    FixedDistribution
    A distribution that does not reestimate
    LabelDistribution
    A distribution that acts on the label of the instance
    MixtureDistribution
    A output distribution that restricts itself to being a mixture of known distributions
    MultivariateGaussian
    A multivariate gaussian distribution
    PrecalculatedDistribution
    A distribution who's probabilities are precalculated and stored in the observation
    UnivariateGaussian
    A (single variable) gaussian distribution
